author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES CONTINUES ALONG AND SOUTH OF THE PATH OF POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE BERYL TODAY...
summary:
...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING AND A FEW TORNADOES CONTINUES ALONG AND SOUTH OF THE PATH OF POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE BERYL TODAY...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Wed Jul 10
 the center of Beryl was located near 40.9, -85.2
 with movement NE at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
